Test macro pass with special replacements only.

>>> pass_r.adoc

pass:r[char: < > &].

pass:r[replacement: (C) (R) (TM) -- ...]
pass:r[-> => <- <= user's input].

<<< pass_r.html

<div class="paragraph">
<p>char: < > &.</p>
</div>
<div class="paragraph">
<p>replacement: &#169; &#174; &#8482;&#8201;&#8212;&#8201;&#8230;
&#8594; &#8658; &#8592; &#8656; user&#8217;s input.</p>
</div>
